about_the_game: In this Demo, you are tasked with carving out a small home for yourself and a small group of people while fighting back daily raids from around the map in our Endless Slaughter Mode.  Or you can forget all that and live a peaceful life in SANDBOX mode and just relax and build a small colony.
detailed_description: In this Demo, you are tasked with carving out a small home for yourself and a small group of people while fighting back daily raids from around the map in our Endless Slaughter Mode. name: Llanthmar Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64Bit
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Llanthmar is a turn-based, strategy game that tasks you with ensuring the survival of your lost colony on an unknown planet. Gather resources, manufacture supplies, and fight back against anything that threatens to take them away.
